    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Lomni količnik in valovna dolžina</string>
            <string language="en">Index of Refraction and Wavelength</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brechungskoeffizient und Wellenlänge</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Indice de réfraction et la longueur d'onde</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Deslocamento predeterminado de refraction e de 
wavelength</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Indice di rifrazione e la lunghezza d'onda</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ευρετήριο της διάθλασης και του μήκους κύματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Índice de refracción y la longitud de onda</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Goriščna razdalja kaplje, ki deluje kot leča pri različnih valovnih dolžinah svetlobe.</string>
            <string language="en">Focal point of a drop for different wavelengths acting as a lens.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">lomni količnik</string>
            <string language="en">refractive index</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">lom svetlobe</string>
            <string language="en">refraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schwerpunkt eines Tropfens für die 
unterschiedlichen Wellenlängen, die als ein Objektiv dienen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Point focal d'une baisse pour différentes 
longueurs d'onde agissant en tant qu'objectif.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ponto focal de uma gota para os wavelengths 
diferentes que agem como uma lente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Punto focale di una goccia per le lunghezze 
d'onda differenti che fungono da obiettivo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σημείο εστίασης μιας απελευθέρωσης για τα διαφορετικά 
μήκη κύματος που ενεργούν ως φακός.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Punto focal de una gota para diversas longitudes 
de onda que actúan como lente.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brechungsindex</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brechung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">indice de réfraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">réfraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">deslocamento predeterminado refractive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">refraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">indice di rifrazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">rifrazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διαθλαστικό ευρετήριο</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-el">διάθλαση</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-es">índice de refracción</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">refracción</string>
          </keyword>
